segments.text: Hello .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Claire . This is Mick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mick ! Nice to hear from you again . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , thanks . And you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , not so bad . I've been very busy , but I'm going away on holiday soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Listen . I'm phoning because I want to invite you to a party . At our Newhouse . And . .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: New house ? Really ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We've moved . That's why we're giving the party . Can you come ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that depends . When is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This Saturday evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . . . I'm going away on Sunday morning . Very early . Will the party go Convery late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Until two in the morning . But you don't have to stay that long.Well ? What about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll come . But I'd like to bring a present Something for your new house.What would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing . I mean , don't bring anything . It isn't necessary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I'd still like ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just bring yourself ! I'm looking forward to seeingyou again . It's been a long time !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it has . I'm looking forward to seeing you . too . and your new house . Uh . . . when does the party start ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come any time after eight . All right ? .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Oh . by the W ..
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bye ! See you on Saturday evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a moment , Mick . You haven't . . . Mick ? Are you still there ? You haven'tgiven me your new address . Hello ? Mick ? Hello ?
segments.speaker: S1
